sentence.Network_en: The President needed to divert attention away from his own economic record.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统需要将人们的视线从他以往在经济上的表现上转移开。

sentence.Network_en: He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

sentence.Network_en: If you haul hard you will divert the fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果拉网太猛,鱼会被吓跑的.

diverting agent 分流剂diverting device 分散装置diverting means 分流工具

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via French from Latin divertere, from di- 'aside' + vertere 'to turn'

entry.def: To divert vehicles or travellers means to make them follow a different route or go to a different destination than they originally intended. You can also say that someone or something diverts from a particular route or to a particular place.

example.ex: ...Rainham Marshes, east London, where a new bypass will divert traffic from the A13...
example.tran: 伦敦东部的雷纳姆泽，那儿有一条新的旁道将会分流 A13 公路的交通

example.ex: During the strike, ambulances will be diverted to private hospitals...
example.tran: 在罢工期间，救护车将被转到私人医院去。

entry.tran: 改变(资金、资源)的用途;转移
entry.def: To divert money or resources means to cause them to be used for a different purpose.

example.ex: The government is trying to divert more public funds from west to east.
example.tran: 政府正试图将更多的公共基金从西部转到东部。

example.ex: ...government departments involved in diverting resources into community care.
example.tran: 负责将资源用于社区保健的政府部门

entry.def: To divert a phone call means to send it to a different number or place from the one that was dialled by the person making the call.

example.ex: He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
example.tran: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

example.ex: Customers will only incur additional call charges if the call is diverted outside the UK.
example.tran: 只有当电话被转接到英国之外，客户才会被加收额外的电话费。

entry.def: If you say that someone diverts your attention from something important or serious, you disapprove of them behaving or talking in a way that stops you thinking about it.

example.ex: They want to divert the attention of the people from the real issues.
example.tran: 他们想要把人们的注意力从真正的问题上转移开。

example.ex: The President needed to divert attention away from his own economic record.
example.tran: 总统需要将人们的视线从他以往在经济上的表现上转移开。

means.word_mean: 2. send on a course or in a direction different from the planned or intended one
3. occupy in an agreeable, entertaining or pleasant fashion;
4. withdraw (money) and move into a different location, often secretly and with dishonest intentions

auth_sentence.content: You have been thrown up to divert our probing.
auth_sentence.res_content: You have been thrown up to divert our probing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You have been thrown up to divert our probing.

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise requests can divert you from more profitable activities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Otherwise requests can divert you from more profitable activities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Otherwise requests can divert you from more profitable activities.

auth_sentence.content: I had to get planning permission to divert the stream.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had to get planning permission to divert the stream.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had to get planning permission to divert the stream.

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的
stems_affixes.word_buile: controvert[v.反驳,驳斥]+ible可..的→adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 更换信仰的, 修改的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ed……的→adj.更换信仰的, 修改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可改变的, 自由兑换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ible可..的→adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+controvertible[adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的]→adj.无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+convertible[adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的]→adj.不能兑换的,不能变换的
advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防止,避免 ;转移[目光,注意力等]
变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]
stems_affixes.word_buile: con+vert转→v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使转向,使改道;转移[注意力];使娱乐

means.word_mean: 使转移[向],使转向；使绕道；转移

sentences.cn: 那部卡通片转移了孩子们的注意力。
此种游戏孩子们感兴趣。

jushi.english: The traffic had to be diverted because of the accident.
jushi.chinese: 由于出了车祸,行人车辆只好改道。

jushi.english: Music diverts me after a day's work.
jushi.chinese: 我一天工作完了以后,以听音乐为娱乐。

jushi.english: She often diverts herself in reading novels.
